testcase.classname: E2E_02 E2E testing is performed by following the steps below
testcase.name: Registered user creates and submits a new withdrawal value from the withdrawal tab
testcase.system-out: * The user enters site with the given "Url".................................passed * Click on login button.....................................................passed * send registered "username" to username text box...........................passed * send registered "sifre" to password text box..............................passed * Click on submit button....................................................passed * registered user clicks on the withdraw tab................................passed * Click the select GetAway..................................................passed * Click on the amounth......................................................passed * Send 100 to the box.......................................................passed * Click on Sumit under the Withdraw Via IT text that appears................passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: E2E_02 E2E testing is performed by following the steps below
testcase.name: Admin approves pending withdrawal and manage an active users and send message and change some information about profile
testcase.system-out: * Navigate to Admin page "adminUrl".........................................passed * send adminUserName to username textbox....................................passed * send adminPasword to password textbox.....................................passed * click on the login button.................................................passed * Admin clicks on the withdrawals tab.......................................passed * Admin selects the pending withdrawals tab.................................passed * Admin clicks on the details button of user ismail.........................passed * admin copies ismails Trx Number...........................................passed * Admin clicks on the approve button........................................passed * admin writes ismails Trx Number in the Approve Withdrawal Confirmation box.passed * Click on the submit button................................................passed * Click on the Approved Withdrawals tab.....................................passed * admin verifies that ismails withraw is approved...........................passed * admin clicks on the manages users tab.....................................passed * admin clicks on the active users tab......................................passed * admin writes ismailtemiz in the usernameEmail box and clicks the search button..passed * admin clicks on the details button........................................passed * admin clicks the Notifications button.....................................passed * admin clicks the Send Notifications button...............................passed * admin writes subject in the Subject box...................................passed * admin writes Merhaba İsmail ben LoanTechExperden Yetiş LoanTechExper yönetim ekibi olarak bu ayın en çok aktif kullanıcısı olarak sizi seçtik Bundan dolayı size bir sürprizimiz var Sizin tüm loan planlarınıza %1 indirim uyguladık. Hayırlı olsun LoanTechExper olarak bizi tercih ettiğiniz için çok teşekkür ederiz in the Messagebox.passed * Click on the submit button on message page................................passed * admin clicks on his name at the top right and clicks on profile...........passed * By updating the admin profile name it writes its own name instead of Super Admins.passed * Click the Upload File button and upload a profile photo...................passed * Close the page............................................................passed
